teacheasy.data.lessondata

Class LessonGradeSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.data.lessondata.LessonGradeSettings

  • public class LessonGradeSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the data that describes the grade settings for a lesson as defined in the TeachEasy digital lesson XML format.
    Version:
    1.0 08 Feb 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.

      • LessonGradeSettings

                   java.lang.String nPassMessage,

        Constructor to create the data object with the data parsed from XML.
        Parameters:
        nPassBoundary - The pass mark.
        nPassMessage - The message to display to passing students.
        nFailMessage - The message to display to failing students.
